Please set up a login and password for t: Please set up a login and password for the administrator user. This step is necessary to let you login the first time. You can create more administrators later by going to the 'Settings' workspace.
Use a strong password (more than 8 chara: Use a strong password (more than 8 characters, complicated ones.
Try sending an email with the configured: Try sending an email with the configured data
Set up system to send emails: Set up system to send emails
Set up the correct value to send emails: Set up the correct value to send emails
Default 'From' email used to send emails: Default 'From' email used to send emails.
How the application configuration data w: Database where the application configuration data will be stored (users, parameters, etc). This is not the place where your actual documents are managed. Use the 'Test Connexion' button to check the parameters before going to next step.
Select how the configurations will be st: Select how the configurations will be stored
Database system (production environments: Database (production environments, requires a DBMS supported by APPLICATION_TITLE)
Create users for your organization right: Create users for your organization right now. You can do this later by going to the Settings workspace.
Set up application title and create a co: Set up application title and create a connexion identifier for the super-administrator user. Make sure to use a strong password, as this user will have full access to the server.
An additional message displayed at start: An additional message displayed at startup, on the splash screen and the login screen.
Database type (Sqlite3 is NOT recommende: Database type (Sqlite3 is NOT recommended for production purpose.)
Please review these technical parameters: Please review these technical parameters. Encoding and URI should be auto-detected, but please make sure they reflect your actual server configuration.
Please make sure to set the encoding cor: Please make sure to set the encoding corresponding to your server configuration, something like ln_LN.CHARSET, e.g en_US.UTF-8
Make sure this is correct, as it's used: Make sure this is correct, as it's used to rewrite the htaccess file
Select a language activated by default(: Select a language activated by default( users will still be able to switch)
Use key\/value store to cache server dat: Use key/value store to cache server data in-memory. If APC/APCu is detected, it will be enabled by default, you can change this setting later to use a dedicated server like Redis or Memcache.
Login of the administrative user, typica: Login of the administrative user, typically an email address.
